body:
# Joomla-PDF

Joomla-PDF is an HTML5 technology experiment that explores building a faithful
and efficient Portable Document Format (PDF) renderer without native code 
assistance.

The idea was from spawned from [pdf.js](https://github.com/mozilla/pdf.js) 

Our goal is to create a Joomla plugin that provides the same functionality based on their work.
 

# Getting started
### Online demo

### Getting the code
To get a local copy of the current code, clone it using git:

    $ git clone git://github.com/N6REJ/Joomla-pdf.git joomla-pdf
    $ cd joomla-pdf
or
https://github.com/N6REJ/Joomla-pdf.git

Next, you need to start a local web server
the view we're currently going to start with will be at 
http://localhost/Joomla-pdf/web/viewer.html
you may change which pdf is being rendered by changing line 6 of viewer.js


# Learning
please see 
[pdf.js](https://github.com/mozilla/pdf.js) project for more info on their api


# Contributing
Joomla-pdf is a community-driven project, so contributors are always welcome.
name: Joomla-pdf
tagline: Create a html5 based Joomla plugin to render pdf's.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
